headline: Boyd Gaming: 6 Straight Double Beats And Still Room To Run (Earnings Preview)
summary: Boyd Gaming (BYD) remains a top casino pick, supported by disciplined capital allocation and robust shareholder returns.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid MGM and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, MGM Resorts’s shares have sunk to $35.20, producing a disappointing 5.3% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 10.1% gain. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
